titleStmt.title: The antiquity of reformation: or, An observation proving the Great Turke a triangle, and the rest of the world roundheads. Wherein is shewed, a difference between the government of the Word of God, and best reformed churches.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B. Alsop, and R. Harper, at the Bible and Harpe in Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
